short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of BIG FAT webdevelopment tools, with Tailwind support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension contains various tools that will help users develop websites. It currently contains a color picker and a set of measurement tools.

All the available tools have Tailwind support. For example: when you pick a clolor with the color picker the extension tell you if it's a default Tailwind class or not.
